Request for a base64-encoded unsigned Universal Send transaction

:::note
- Refer to [Send API doc](/docs/universal-send-api) for more information
:::


<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"type":"object","required":["inviteSigner","sender","amount"],"properties":{"inviteSigner":{"type":"string","description":"- Public key address generated from the hash of the invite code\n- Do note that, the invite code requires to be generated client side, [refer to docs](/docs/universal-send-api)\n- Please handle invite code and secret key with highest security as user funds are involved\n"},"sender":{"type":"string","description":"- Public key address of the sender\n- This address will be funding the amount to be sent and the token accounts involved\n"},"amount":{"type":"string","description":"- Amount in atomic value (before decimals)\n- E.g. to send 1 USDC is equivalent of `amount='1000000'`\n- Do note that there will be additional SOL amount being used in the transaction for transaction fees and token accounts\n"},"mint":{"type":"string","description":"- Defaults to WSOL mint\n- Only pass in this parameter with other mint when required\n"}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Successful response","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","required":["tx","expiry","totalFeeLamports"],"properties":{"tx":{"type":"string","description":"- Base64-encoded unsigned Universal Send transaction\n"},"expiry":{"type":"string","description":"- Unix timestamp of when the invite will expire\n- Expired invites will automatically clawback to sender\n"},"totalFeeLamports":{"type":"string","description":"- Amount of fees required for network's transaction fee and token accounts\n"}}}}}},"400":{"description":"Bad request body","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"error":{"type":"string"}},"required":["error"]}}}},"500":{"description":"Internal error","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"error":{"type":"string"}},"required":["error"]}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
